travellerstoasts.carrotconfig.title: TravellersToasts Configuration!
travellerstoasts.carrotconfig.maxInhabit:
Denotes the maximum time (in minutes) a chunk can have a player in its vicinity before biome toasts are prevented from showing within its borders.

(§oHigher values may be preferable for high-player worlds!§r§r)
travellerstoasts.carrotconfig.toastCoold: Denotes the time (in minutes) a biome toast will be prevented from showing again, §oper biome§r.
travellerstoasts.carrotconfig.usePersist:
Denotes whether a biome toast should show §c§oonly§r §c§oonce§r, §oper biome§r, per world.

(§oCheck is more reliable on servers with the mod installed!§r§r)
